named-query.name: Docent.findByWeddeBetween
named-query.query: select d from Docent d where d.wedde between :van and :tot order by d.wedde, d.id

named-query.name: Docent.algemeneOpslag
named-query.query: update Docent d set d.wedde = d.wedde * :factor

named-query.name: Cursus.findByNaamContains
named-query.query: select c from Cursus c where c.naam like :zoals order by c.naam

named-query.name: Campus.findByGemeente
named-query.query: select c from Campus c where c.adres.gemeente = :gemeente order by c.naam

named-query.name: Campus.findAll
named-query.query: select c from Campus c order by c.naam
